Channel_Name.Channel_Description:
GUVI is an IIT-M & IIM-A incubated edu-tech company that offers Wide range of online Tech courses in your Native language.
With 100% placement support, Globally recognized certifications, Mentors from top global product companies  and Platforms improve your Programming and IT skills GUVI does it all. With over 18 Lakh+ learners and 9+ years of experience we provide apex learning through our Edu-tech services, GUVI shares its most loved Tech-videos on YouTube!

What’s on our YouTube Channel?
Career guidance videos that give an idea for beginners & early professionals to upgrade their careers.
New initiatives & offers that unlock your flexible path for learning the latest technologies.
Walkthrough videos of our practice platforms that shape up your coding & web development skills.

Know more by visiting our official website - www.guvi.in

Video_Id_37.Video_Name: What we can do? vs What do we do? Makes all the Difference| payITforward | Ahaguru CEO | GUVI
Video_Id_37.Video_Description:
In this episode of payITforward our GUVI CEO Arun Prakash and Balaji Sampath, CEO of Ahaguru, engage in a thought-provoking conversation. Balaji shares compelling insights from his English Program Campaign on village children. Discover the eye-opening revelations about young minds struggling with fundamental concepts like subtraction. Join the conversation as they discuss bridging educational gaps and empowering the next generation.


Balaji Sampath is the founder and CEO of Ahaguru. A pioneer education start-up in online coaching that engages in providing training courses on different subjects online. During his two decades as a renowned teacher, he has guided thousands of students to get into IITs, NITs, and BITS. Balaji’s Physics and Math classes focus on conceptual clarity, fun experiments, and innovative problem-solving techniques that he has developed. Balaji Sampath is also the Founder of AID India, a non-profit organization that has educated two million poor children and has constructed 500+ homes for homeless families.

#PayItForward #EducationForAll #BalajiSampath #GuviCEO #AhaguruCEO #guvi

Video_Id_49.Video_Name: Solving Complex Problems? Omitting Easy Problems? payITforward | Arun Prakash| Ahaguru CEO | GUVI
Video_Id_49.Video_Description:
In this episode of payITforward our GUVI CEO Arun Prakash and Balaji Sampath, CEO of Ahaguru, engage in a thought-provoking conversation. Balaji shares compelling insights from his English Program Campaign on village children. Discover the eye-opening revelations about young minds struggling with fundamental concepts like subtraction. Join the conversation as they discuss bridging educational gaps and empowering the next generation.


Balaji Sampath is the founder and CEO of Ahaguru. A pioneer education start-up in online coaching that engages in providing training courses on different subjects online. During his two decades as a renowned teacher, he has guided thousands of students to get into IITs, NITs, and BITS. Balaji’s Physics and Math classes focus on conceptual clarity, fun experiments, and innovative problem-solving techniques that he has developed. Balaji Sampath is also the Founder of AID India, a non-profit organization that has educated two million poor children and has constructed 500+ homes for homeless families.

#PayItForward #EducationForAll #BalajiSampath #GuviCEO #AhaguruCEO #guvi
